page.title: 19CLITHEROE GUIDES AT WADDOW
page.content: On Wednesday 26th June the Guides from Edisford school went to Waddow Hall to see the Light of Friendship. This is what Princess Margaret gave to Mrs. Lambert, the Chief Commissioner of North West England to pass on to all the Brownies and Guides in the district. We set off for Waddow Hall at 1.30 p.m. in Miss Lockets car. When we got there one of the Guiders told us what we had to do. We went into the dining room to sit down while Mrs. Lambert told us about the "Light", then she lit all our candles from the Light of Friendship. After this we all went for a drink and biscuit before returning to school.
